description: Kids in government schools are about to be flooded with hand sanitizer and exposed to toxic cleaning chemicals all day long. They will be isolated from each other and things like recess and PE are going to disappear. Plexiglass, directional arrows on the floor, X’s to sit on will be the norm. All that plus the normal prison like setting where children are taught to obey and conform while being told to memorize and repeat useless and incorrect information.
